channel.title: No-IP DUC- Please help
channel.description:
Alright Basicly I did everything like all the tuts tell you to do, my server works great on hamachi but when I open up my no-ip DUC, I have my no-ip checked and the little smiley face is blushing, but ppl say they cant get on my server. Help? :|
Bumps appreciated, Please help me out I'm new to no-ip but Iv been coding for over a year now dont need any tips on making a server just the no-ip part. Thanks, Mod Whip Owner of Modscape ~Mod Ub3r~

item.title: No-IP DUC- Please help
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

www.portforward.com

Pick your router type, exact to model number. Then follow the default guide for this router. You will not find MoparScape or any private servers on the preset applications, and you don’t need any special protocols unlike most of the predefined applications. Follow the guide exactly, portforwarding whatever port you use (typically 43594, else it’s 5555 or 8080 (else you’re wierd ;])). Then do what you’re already doing with your No-IP DUC and everything should work.

Read full topic
